post.body: i just told leesha that you're always drooling over my cooking skills haha
haha i say that a lot
i hope tomorrow! i want to see!
good, i might have been mad because she's so sweet haha. who are you talking about!? IM ME HO
pursebuzz? i have no idea, i'm kind of an idiot
wait, who is the holy master?
it's taken me like a year to just get 600
mmm i make pumpkin pie brownies all the time
<333 i was just telling andrew about your hotness, while i watch him shoot super mutants
we just ate hotdogs and kraut, now i'm watching andrew play fallout3
pfft i still play original nes and sega like they're brand new!
we took a few, i'm going to include them with my fotd. i'll let you know when it's up
i'm uploading some REALLY OLD pictures to my myspace and laughing sooo hard over how i used to look
someone just anonymously commented or something on lj saying andrew and i would be more attractive without the "bullrings" fuck offffff
fotd x a million posted on m_c, ladies!
